reviewText: Very poor quality workmanship,  embarrassing to the blacksmith comunity
Well, my husband loved it anyways! I got this DVD for him for Christmas and he's a blacksmith...
great Video bill once again does a great teaching job
good video on making your own tongs
You will get more from quality YouTube videos. I was mad after I watched this DVD.
Good show! I'm a stickler for education videos that don't show you close-ups on hands-on topics, but Bill Epps NAILED IT. I have a few of his others and my blacksmithing buddy and I like 'em.

This video by Bill Epps is very nicely done.  Bill's step by step instuctions are incredibly easy to understand.  Three type of tongs as well as three different ways to make tongs.  A great learning video. Will buy his other videos.
